## Pages

### Home
https://chupix-6f78bcb0.zappy5.app
Discover safe baby toys for newborns that spark joy and development. Shop our curated collection of educational, Montessori-inspired toys for babies and toddlers.

### Products
https://chupix-6f78bcb0.zappy5.app/products
Browse our complete collection of safe baby toys for newborns, developmental toys for 6 month olds, and affordable Montessori toys. Quality baby toys that nurture growth.

### About
https://chupix-6f78bcb0.zappy5.app/about
Learn about Chupix's mission to provide safe baby toys for newborns and developmental toys that nurture growth. Discover our commitment to quality, safety, and sustainability.

### Contact
https://chupix-6f78bcb0.zappy5.app/contact
Contact Chupix for questions about safe baby toys for newborns, product recommendations, or order assistance. We're here to help you find the perfect toys for your baby.
